title: Relaxing holiday you won't regret!
text:
This is a beautiful hotel with extremely comfortable beds, delicious food and most important excellent customer service. Location was perfect for us as we did a day trip to Krka waterfalls. The breakfast was 5 star!
Uber is available and very cheap if you want to go to city centre!

title: Next to Radisson
text: We stayed in hotel so it is right next to radisson panama canal. Decent meals nothing special. Nice view to see ships passing by. Good prices.

title: Nice Peruvian place !
text: Nazca was a nice discovery in Casco Viejo! When we arrived it was crowded so you have to wait a bit ! Dishes are well executed and with fair prices, a true Peruvian menu! Surly visit this place!

title: Nice place and great staff!
text: We arrived for a dinner. Nice cozy atmosphere, and amazing service. Girl, the manager was all exceptionally attentive and friendly. The pizza- like - meat was great, with the melted cheese w/ tomato & onions. Other dish was chicken filet - really delicious. A really nice spot!

title: Unique spot
text:
This is old fashioned winery with excellent local products on a pretty good location.
Very well prepared kind and attentive staff. Definitely an experience.

title: nothing special
text: This is irrelevant place. Its good only for instagram freaks. The service is very poor and the coffee is extremely expensive...

title: amazing history facts
text:
lifetime experience on acropolis. amazing history facts!
Democracy, philosophy, civilazation and architecture...
